PIN.values: |Scalar and vector fields are both a type of function that takes a space ‘p’ and returns a value for each location in that space. A scalar field returns a single value for each location, while a vector field returns a vector. In the context of fieldtrip we are working with scalar and vector fields in 2D and 3D space.|
|2D & 3D scalar & vector fields: 4 new data types|
|Don't worry too much about the details, this patch is just for the concept|
